website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are a novice or an avid leather crafter, this kit has you covered. It contains a huge assortment of tools with a case for keeping them organized.
pros: Comprehensive kit, as it includes 273 leatherworking tools
Collection offers a nice selection of leather stamps and needles
cons: Some reports of tools breaking with typical use
Pricey, but it's well-stocked with just about every tool you'd need

customer_reviews.title: It Includes Everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this kit! It’s more than I ever imagined. I’m just starting out with leather and this kit included everything and more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of toys...does not organize everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He already had some leatherwork tools but I wanted to give him more punches and supplies. This pack did not disappoint in that regard! It did, however, disappoint at organization in the case. There’s nothing to keep all the pieces separated or organized, so the case is worthless. And the cutting mat it comes with doesn’t even fit down in the case. My husband turned around and went and bought a toolbox to move things into the next day.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at leatherworks and the contents of this box has very little to offer. There is not a lot you can do at your home using these tools kit. Rather I would suggest you take advice from an experienced person and buy all the required spares and put them in a box. If it costs you $XXX, thats better than what comes out of this box. I am not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Siddarth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I am new to leatherwork and so far the tools have been good for practice, except for the stitch punch pliers. The first time I used them, they broke in half! Considering that I didn’t get to complete my first project because an important tool was defective, I am pretty disappointed. I haven’t been able to use most of the tools yet so I am a little worried that other items may break before getting much use out of them. Fortunately I am just starting leatherwork as a hobby and don’t yet have customers waiting for me to finish their orders. Hopefully you have better luck if you purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the poorest quality products I have ever ordered off of Amazon. The tools are not sharp and were produced using the cheapest of materials. These tools are hazardous to the user due to poor construction. This kit should cost 20$
customer_reviews.author: Devin Dequaine

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Would liked to see a content page.missing an item
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Would have liked to have an instruction manual or at least something showing what each tool was. MISSING ONE OF THE AWL’s
customer_reviews.author: Nynat02

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This kit worked out great for getting me started. Lots of fun extra things that you wouldn't buy unless it came in a kit. Hammer isn't great. I have no idea what the rubber pad is useful for yet...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, inferior quality. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bent the awl the first time I used it; the plastic cutting board provided with the kit was harder than the steel. Another awl tool with swappable needles didn't accept the needles provided with it, they're too large to fit. The interior of the box is completely disorganized; it's merely a plastic shell filled with loose items that barely fit. I strongly advise against purchasing this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Devin O.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality tools for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, nothing was broken. Comes with several sheets of paper explaining what each tool is and what it does. It came on time, and packed nicely. Everything was packaged seperately, and with like pieces. Anything sharp was packaged with a rubberize piece or with bubble wrap to prevent any accidents when opening. Thank you guys very much! (:
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and used pieces
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tools is really very low. there are missing parts on the tools and I saw tools that were already used. I was bought everything in a store today.
customer_reviews.author: Axel SEZER

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged before shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered very quick. However plastic box was broken in one corner. Didn’t notice until I had unwrapped all items inside box. Box must have been dropped from very high or a lot of force to be broken such a way. Didn’t feel like returning purchase because didn’t want to delay working on my projects.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK GIRAULT

customer_reviews.title: Unorganized
customer_reviews.text: After learning a little more after purchasing the kit I think that there are pieces missing that should have been included in a kit. Everything is just stuffed into a case that it barely fits in. There is no way to organize the kit in the case provided other than sliding things on top of each other until you can get it to close.
customer_reviews.author: GeekStatus

customer_reviews.title: That you have the space to get started
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything that helped me get started doing leather products.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: not great quality
customer_reviews.text: the letter stamps had defects in them as did the whole punches so if your looking for a clean punch or stamp I did not get that from this. you get what you paid for I had the money available for better tools so I just returned and bought better tools.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Not primo quality but I knew that when I bought it however better than expected. Don't regret it for just starting out so if I decide leather work wasn't for me I wouldn't be out over $800 bucks or more. So far I've made a few things and I'm happy with how well the tools perform
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No guide or tool description sent. I'm lost
customer_reviews.text: I can't answer any questions bc I received kit but no instructions or guide or what tools are for!! Be very careful w some of tools wrapped in plastic very sharp i nicked my finger pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality. A lot of useless tools
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Very low quality. 80% of tools - garbage that you would not use. I'm not recommend it to beginners Toolbox was with scratches and dust when I opened the box. Cutting mat was deformed a little To begin with simple projects you will need to spend more money to buy missing tools
customer_reviews.author: Sergii

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of tools.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tools are a bit chintzy. But the majority of them are good basic starter tools
customer_reviews.author: Carl barfield

customer_reviews.title: Lot of tools with an inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool set and an simple way do get a bunch of tools to get started. The only down side was once I unpacked the tools there isn’t a way to organize them back into the case. No dividers to keep them organized so you just dump the tools back in loose. I’m planning on buying a separate box to keep everything in and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Broad selection of tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit. It’s the most cost effective way to get a broad selection of tools for the beginning leathercrafter.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Henry

customer_reviews.title: Tools great,case cheap, bad organization
customer_reviews.text: The tool themselves look good, but the reason I'm giving this three stars is the case is cheap mine came with the clasp broken and in the picture the tools look organized nicely but my tools look like they were just thrown in there wouldn't care if it were for me but it's a gift
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Martin

customer_reviews.title: Complete for beginners, really fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete and really handful. I messy up the letters but was my fault because I put the leather on the concrete and not in the plastic board to cute. Worth it the money for beginners. Really complete!
customer_reviews.author: Dayane Olson

customer_reviews.title: High praise from the picky!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Wanted professional and cheap, got professional and cheap! Almost everything you need included! If you aren't the best at making your own leacher designs or you're a beginner, I highly suggest getting leather wallet patterns to start out with. This really is worth every penny I spent, and I cant wait til my leather comes in. It was time to get back into my craft. Thank you, product sellers!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who has been wanting to learn leather work. He loves it! The only recommendation he has is an organization container for the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Contracting Specialist

customer_reviews.title: This is not very quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, the package was wrapped with bubble wraps very well! Im new to leather crafting, but I found some of tools is very hard to use. The hole punch will not punch through the thin leather, and the stitching punch is very poor design and made. Ended up return the package.
customer_reviews.author: Ting M.

customer_reviews.title: Tools are ok, case is useless
customer_reviews.text: Received this on Saturday. Nice selection of tools for a beginner, but the plastic case has no use for the tools. There is nothing in the case to secure the tools in place so you will have a jumbled mess every time you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tools and setup
customer_reviews.text: The main tools in the kit you will need are cheap. Had to replace 80% of the tools with professional tools. If you are serious about leather crafting spend the money and build you own set up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew White

customer_reviews.title: Leather Tools, some are COOL!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging! At least you can keep up with the tools. Some work some not so much. Great if you don’t have a lot of expectations out of the tools, you are getting what you pay for be that good or bad! You can make the most out of it. I mean you are getting 273 tools for under 80.00. You can draw your own conclusions.
customer_reviews.author: SutphinA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 13 year old grandson. He was very happy with all the tools and was able to begin waitlists on his leather project.
customer_reviews.author: KBE

customer_reviews.title: Low quality variety of tools
customer_reviews.text: You get a variety of low quality items for making leather. Instead of including so many items, maybe it would be best to include a few items but make them higher quality. I wish I would have just individually bought the items I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Katy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I am beginning in leatherwork, and everything suggested on YouTube for beginners was inside. Seems to be of good quality, and the case is extremely convenient for travel. Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: June Ross Galleries

customer_reviews.title: check all items individual for quality and working condition
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner the tools are so far doing the job. A descent combination of tools includes in this kit. However, there was a sewing awl that was broken, only realized it when it was time to start sewing. And some of the needles appeared to be used and some are crooked. That was a major disappointment for me as that was the main reason I purchased this kit.
customer_reviews.author: MelD

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit!! There were a few pieces that I had to get else where because either the one in the package was too cheap. Overall, it contains pretty much everything you need to get started, minus the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Peke

customer_reviews.title: Almost Good
customer_reviews.text: Expected more pro, pieces, better cutter, better matt, better hole puncher
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce
customer_reviews.text: New to the trade, but anxious to get started! I’m not going to say I know much about the tools or quality, but it seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Really bad quality
customer_reviews.text: 80% of the stuff you have in the kit are useless due to a bad quality. I'd rather buy only the essentials from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Meshi Fried

customer_reviews.title: My kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for our anniversary and I love it. The only thing is the hammer has already started to chip so I need to buy a new one. Also the awl bent after i used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Akers

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Tools are super duper. The case is fine but not great. I unpacked my tools and put them into my own tool case. It actually was better than I imagined from the description and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I expected. Great pieces for starter kit. Great value. The only 2 things I won’t use in the kit are the scissors and the awl. Spend $20 bucks and get a good awl. Otherwise I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hoadley

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the packing and came exactly as described. Only a few things I would have liked to have been included like a swivel knife. Otherwise great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels C.

customer_reviews.title: For the novice which is me it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed to do the projects I wanna do I received it’s a good basic kit as I am a novice so yes I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nick Alban

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools as described
customer_reviews.text: The tools are just as described. They all fit back in the case the only noticeable thing is the large cutting mat is a bit wide and bent as the case’s handle won’t allow it to lay flat. The bend in the mat cane out after it could lay flat for a bit. I would recommend and buy this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the tools are horrible. The exacto blade was dull so was the swivel knife. Same way with the edge bevler.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Unique complete set of leather working tools
customer_reviews.text: Set was revived in good shape, contains a good selection of leather working tools. Great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy costumer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kit. Lot of tools. This my recommendation for this product
customer_reviews.author: Jesus marin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase !
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with our purchase and highly recommend it to other people !
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fulford

customer_reviews.title: A good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: A good starter kit. I would have bought something smaller but this had a complete package of what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tools. Could be sharper and better quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of useful items. Have to say this is definitly a beginners kit of a lower quality. Tools are not as sharp as they should be but can be sharpened. Overall decent coverage of what is needed for leather working, just not the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pasionek

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He was very happy with it and has already made some really nice pieces. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crappie hole punch pikers
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like about the tool was the hole punch pikers they was sorry crap I had to use the hole punch tools but other than that every thing was oh ok.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee Koziatek

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet Great starter kit. I'm very excited the tools are of good quality and wonderful variety, however, the case it comes in is not what it looks like you can not keep it organized everything is loose.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived at a fast time. Amazing packaging and great care. I am really very happy. Thank you and don't hesitate to buy the product worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can find Better
customer_reviews.text: They put too many tools into too small a case made of cheap plastic. Case is useless as it cannot hold all the tools let’s alone keep them organized. Waste of money prefer quality over quantity
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set plus some
customer_reviews.text: More then enough tools to get someone going in leather work.
customer_reviews.author: Trent C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son as a birthday gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Clark

customer_reviews.title: is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: man first time using something like this and this project is great thank you
customer_reviews.author: angel salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good for experienced leather workers
customer_reviews.text: The product has everything you could probably need for leather work. I don't think it's for beginners because there aren't enough instructions to get started without some experience
customer_reviews.author: donna m gillis

customer_reviews.title: Mishandled package
customer_reviews.text: Product seems great! However, it was definitely thrown around during delivery. A few things were smashed, and when I opened the kit, all the contents were all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Recommended to everyone. I’m a beginner and it gave me instructions on how to use and what each product was. Great quality .
customer_reviews.author: Cassidee m.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leather tools! I bought them to start my projects and would recommed them to anyone who's looking to start leather working.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Leather craft
customer_reviews.text: This kit is assembled at Chinese sale. That says it all. Not recommended for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: There are better quality version of most of the tools in this kit however, this has most of what you will need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck K.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband. He loved it! He found out early what he got because he decided to snoop 🙄😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not like picture
customer_reviews.text: my case locks are broken, had needles freely in box not in broken container, items do not fit nicely organized in case, its just a free for all.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl York

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well-made nice amount of selection for what someone starting and leather
customer_reviews.author: Rsa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very happy! Good quality and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of tools for the beginning leather worker.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had time to use the tools yet but I have inspected them thoroughly and I am pleased with them for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RiverMan Knifes

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: only some work and when they work they only work mediocre. corner punches and hole punches were not sharp at allll!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all of the pieces you’d want one to have, especially for those who are wanting to learn leather work!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Rust issue on groover but great product
customer_reviews.text: Groover tool metal is rusted can’t twist it off, basically broken . Everything else is fine very good deal
customer_reviews.author: Kennardi

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and the recipient was delighted! So much value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy York

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had everything that was advertised compact and easy to use thank you for such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Marie Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Just like what the picture shows online. A christmas gift for my dad
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wells

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I can ask for.Very nice and delivered right on time
customer_reviews.author: Jomma

customer_reviews.title: Decent product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: It came as promised and all parts were decent quality. Case was broken at clasp.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to start working with leather. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, light duty stamps and hammer overall a beginners kit.
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL cANTU

customer_reviews.title: Tools broke before I could finish my project
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit as someone new to leather working, It came with no instructions however. The needles were of low quality (although it came with many) and bent almost immediately. The hole punch, which for my purposes was the most crucial tool in the kit, broke before I could finish my first project. I now have to buy a new punch, which will cost me at least 15$. For the price of this kit I was really hoping for tools of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Stokes

customer_reviews.title: I love it thx
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I can't wait to get started on my leather DIY'S. Look to be all there. I'm not too aanel on counting every lil peace but i had a few things nothing worg havine two...right?
customer_reviews.author: 🐾Susie Wade🐾

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great. You do better buying things individually
customer_reviews.text: There is another review that touches on this too. There are A LOT of pretty low-quality Do-That's that you don't really need, will likely never use, and if you use them you'll notice the low quality. Echoing a previous reviewer that I used I had listened to, do some extra research to list all the item that you will actually need based on the projects you think you'll do and by those tools individually. You will end-up with quality tools that will last, will make the project easier, and might save money in the process. Buying cheap now might mean buying expensive later.
customer_reviews.author: Joë

customer_reviews.title: Really Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love all the contents. The only thing...and easily fixable...the case is packed very tight and you need a degree in physics to put everything in there when you take it all out. I'll transfer it to something else because the real value is in all of the tools. The case will be very usable for something else. I would highly recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok, will have a better idea after I’ve had a chance to use them on a couple of projects.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic case was broken on arrival. This was probably due to inadequate packing. Not a major issue but an annoyance. I have not had a chance to use the stamping tools yet but they appear to be of lesser quality than the old ones I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Leather Fun
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to finally have tools for doing my leather work again. Wow what an amazing set!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Henke

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with lots of tools
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great for beginners, it has pretty much everything you need to get started in leatherworking. The price is great, allowing you to upgrade tools to better quality as you learn and your skills grow.
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: We are super-excited to have this set! It seems like it has amost everything we may need to start leather working Great value....it would cost a LOT to buy all these tools per piece. We are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: CNR

customer_reviews.title: leather working tools and supplies
customer_reviews.text: bought for my husband to start a new craft in leather making. this kit has so much and for a great price. fast delivery and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT! WORTH VERY PENNY! MY HUSBAND WAS LIKE A KID AT CHRISTMAS. HE LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love the tools
customer_reviews.text: Great! Comes with so many tools! Love it, worth the money
customer_reviews.author: SueZ

customer_reviews.title: Very well supplied.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a present for somebody just starting leather working. He felt it was complete.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S

customer_reviews.title: Great kit of leather tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great package price! Used on deer hide and cow hide. Very nice selection of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Was a gifted was impressed by all items in kit and all items look to be of good quality
customer_reviews.author: EdgarM.

customer_reviews.title: Good starting point
customer_reviews.text: We are missing the thimble and awl but it's a good starter kit and good value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Beckman

customer_reviews.title: No material for experience !
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner gift, it would have been 100% more exciting for the giftie had there been at least a few pieces of leather in the kit to experience the gift especially at Christmas. As the giver I either over looked that it didn’t have it or in my excitement of finding this I jumped on the deal. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a great kit for learning to work with leather tooling.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Allen

customer_reviews.title: Tools to get you started
customer_reviews.text: These tools are great to get you started and familiar with tools you may not even be aware of. Not the greatest quality but they are serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rios

customer_reviews.title: alot for the money
customer_reviews.text: got it for my husband, he seems to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so beyond happy with this leather crafting kit! Absolutely worth the price and I can't wait to make my first project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: The tools are cheaply made but are fine for beginners that may be honing their skills.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Danner

product_meta.title: 273 Pieces Leather Working Tools and Supplies with Leather Tool Box Cutting Mat Hammer Stamping Tools Needles Snaps and Rivets Kit Perfect for Stitching Punching Cutting Sewing Leather Craft Making
feature_bullets: ▲Come with Leather Tool Box -- The Leather Crafting Tools kit comes with a high quality tool box. More durable than carton box, very suitable for long time using. Besides, everything you need is included in this leather tool box, stay organized, you don't worry about lose anything and can take on belt or leather handbag making project immediately!

▲Leather Rivets Kit with Different Type Fixing Tools -- This leather rivets set with fixing tools can help you more easier to do some leather and cloth repairing work. Very suitable for DIY leather crafts, clothing repairing and decoration of wristbands, hats, jeans, windbreakers, belts, shoes, sandals, down jackets, shirt, bags, backpack and so on.

▲20 Tape Leather Stamp and Letter Number Stamps Set -- The leather kit including 20 tape leather stamping tool perfect for beginners, such as flower, butterfly, and other background filling shapes. Letter number stamping set can punching name on leather or metal. Decorate your belts, wallets, key cases and more, make them more personalized and unique, help you create a striking impression with your work.

▲Leather Hole Punch and 7 in 1 Stitching Groover -- Adjustable leather edge stitching tool is easy to adjust and can be used to groove the edges of leather. Stitching hole punch with sharp french tooth, punching through leather in quickly and effortlessly. No more noisy and arduous pounding. Perfect for belts, bags, watch bands, saddlery, pet collars, store cards, shoes, fabric, DIY home or craft projects.

▲Perfect Gift for Handicraft Lovers -- Leather craft stamping tools suitable for beginner and proficient. And it can be used as a wonderful gift for parents, family, friends, especially for DIY hand stitching lovers. They will be happy with it that you did it for them. NOTE: Due to the some parts are so sharp that can't be used as toys for baby and children. Therefore, they should be placed beyond the reach of children.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars490 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
